name: Melee Man
description:
A somewhat random action rpg with the goal of cycling through multiple new games to get better and better rewards. Plans for more randomisation in level generation and enemies. Was made in a week as a part of an unofficial Gamejam between a few friends.

No sounds currently unfortunately

Controls (Gamepad reccomended)

Move - WASD/L Stick

Light attack - Left click / RB

Heavy attack - L click + L shift/RT

Block - Right click/LB

Heal - Q/X

Jump - Spacebar/B

Interact - E/A

Lock on - Z/R stick click

Pause - Esc - Tab/Start

DEBUG CONTROLS

1 to clear save data

2 to gain exp

3 to gain Gold

How to Install

Download the game's zip file from Itch

Extract the file and run the title called "MeleeBoy.exe"

Enjoy!
